feed.title: VoidAuth Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for VoidAuth: v1.0.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Added CONTACT_EMAIL config environment variable, 'Contact Us' links by @notquitenothing in https://github.com/voidauth/voidauth/pull/65

Full Changelog: https://github.com/voidauth/voidauth/compare/v1.0.1...v1.0.2

entry.title: New release for VoidAuth: v1.0.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Admin Notification Emails by @notquitenothing in https://github.com/voidauth/voidauth/pull/67
  • Native Clients, Arbitrary Redirect URL Protocols, UserInfo Endpoint Info by @notquitenothing in https://github.com/voidauth/voidauth/pull/71

Full Changelog: https://github.com/voidauth/voidauth/compare/v1.0.2...v1.0.3

entry.title: New release for VoidAuth: v1.0.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Disabling Email Normalization by @notquitenothing in https://github.com/voidauth/voidauth/pull/75

Full Changelog: https://github.com/voidauth/voidauth/compare/v1.0.3...v1.0.4

entry.title: New release for VoidAuth: v1.0.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Sidebar Menu Icons by @notquitenothing in https://github.com/voidauth/voidauth/pull/79
  • Apple Touch Icon Support by @notquitenothing in https://github.com/voidauth/voidauth/pull/80

Full Changelog: https://github.com/voidauth/voidauth/compare/v1.0.4...v1.0.5

entry.title: New release for VoidAuth: v1.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Bump form-data from 4.0.3 to 4.0.4 in /frontend in the npm_and_yarn group across 1 directory by @dependabot[bot] in https://github.com/voidauth/voidauth/pull/81

Full Changelog: https://github.com/voidauth/voidauth/compare/v1.0.5...v1.0.6
